newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Glorious Sun falls again, support seen.
newsitem.headline: Glorious Sun falls again, support seen.

text.p: Profit-takers continued to pressure shares in casual wear maker and retailer Glorious Sun Enterprises Ltd on Monday but brokers said they were expecting support around the HK$3.00 level.
The shares were down HK$0.225 at HK$3.20 ahead of the market close after falling to an intra-day low of HK$3.075.
"The HK$3.00 level is quite reasonable but talking nearly HK$4.00 is crazy. said Louis Tse, executive director of Standard Capital Brokerage. "How do know what next year's profit is like?"
Glorious Sun listed in mid-September at HK$1.60 per share and rose to a peak of HK$4.85.
"I think the shares will gain support at the HK$2.80 to HK$3.00 level - a level at which I will consider accumulating," said Michael Ng, senior analyst at ASG Investment.
